__e: I have thought about you every day, every hour, every minute, that I have been in here.
You call them all day long... because you just wanna know how their day is going... and what they're thinking about and if they're thinking about you.
It's just this whole thing makes me think about Rome, and when I think about Rome, I think about you and...
My son always talks about you.
She's been so chatty lately... wanting to be able to talk about Logan and her life, so...
